Detailed Description

MAC capability flags.

Definition at line 44 of file appFramework.h.

Field Documentation

uint8_t MacCapabilityFlags_t::altPANcoord

Always equals 0.

Definition at line 47 of file appFramework.h.

uint8_t MacCapabilityFlags_t::devType

1 if the joining device is a ZigBee router; 0 if the device is a ZigBee end device or else a router-capable device that is joining as an end device.

Definition at line 50 of file appFramework.h.

uint8_t MacCapabilityFlags_t::pwrSrc

0x01 means mains-powered device;
0x00 means other power source.

Definition at line 53 of file appFramework.h.

uint8_t MacCapabilityFlags_t::rxOnWhenIdle

Determines is the receiver enabled when the device is idle.

Definition at line 55 of file appFramework.h.

uint8_t MacCapabilityFlags_t::rsvd

Reserved. Should always equal 0.

Definition at line 57 of file appFramework.h.

uint8_t MacCapabilityFlags_t::secCapb

MAC security capability. Not supported (always equals 0).

Definition at line 59 of file appFramework.h.

uint8_t MacCapabilityFlags_t::allocAddr

Indicates whether the joining device must be issued a 16-bit network address.
